question: There have been several complaints about the reception area where visitors to your company arrive. Your manager has asked you to suggest how the reception area could be improved.Write letter to your manager. In your letter describe the complaints that have been made. Say why the reception area is important. Suggest how the reception area could be improved.
text: This letter is to express my offer about the reception area that needs to improve as the customer complaints have increased significantly .

I investigated the customer survey, and I realized that most of our visitors are from other countries such as China and Iran.So, this issue that our company did not have an employee who is familiar with the foreign languages must be solved as soon as possible.

This area is extremely crucial for our company as the first place visitors will be is the reception area.Therefore,it is important for the company that be a person who knows to speak other languages.Moreover, this action can cause too convenient for our visitors.

I think the best solution for this problem is that the company must be hiring a professional person who is able to communicate with foreign people,and this idea will be significantly efficient for the customers.
I hope you will find my suggestion helpful,
